name: Bat Rabbits VR
description:
After a nice day in the woods, the rabbits are coming. These are no normal rabbits, these are bad rabbits. You see the chemicals that were dumped in the river turned them bad and now they are coming, coming for you!

Survive the night while dodging flying rabbits and defending yourself with a host of whacky weapons! Bat Rabbits VR. (written with a t because one of the weapons is a bat :thumbs-up:)
